title: Attorney General presents the Government’s case on whole life prison tariffs (Attorney General's Office)
text: ( Source : Attorney General's Office ) The case was brought by whole life prisoner Arthur Hutchinson , who was convicted of three counts of murder, one count of rape and one count of aggravated burglary. Mr Wright told the Court that the UK's
